title: Multidisciplinary Project – Learning A-Z
item_1: Developed an automatic speech-to-text assessment tool to aid teachers in improving elementary literacy
item_2: Updated teacher-facing side of project to effectively display results of student recordings
item_3: Coordinated with UX students in programming and designing an effective report of assessment results

title: Emergency Response Tweet Classification – Girls Encoded Research
item_1: Researched NLP methods under Dr. Kummerfeld in order to classify Twitter emergency response posts
item_2: Applied text classifiers and processing pipelines supplied by the Python library spaCy in labeling tweets with level of urgency and associated disaster event

title: Stoody – MHacks11
item_1: Developed front/back end to create study location sharing app for college students using React Native
item_2: Designed app by researching UX principles, resulting in a simplistic and intuitive interaction for users
item_3: Streamlined workflow by researching into use of git and thus making a git cheat sheet for team members
